data.name: Twin Star Exorcists: Unomiya Tenma - Transcendence
data.short_description: A Dragon Spot in Kumano results in a brief detour before the Twin Stars and Sae arrive in Kyoto, and they meet the strongest member of the Twelve Guardians.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
